formulas.name: QueryBuilderScreenCurrentProductsFetcher
QueryBuilderScreenEnrtyFetcher
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name, Product2Id, Capacity_Desks__c, Size_m__c, UnitPrice FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" + {!ProductSubType.value} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" +{!Get_Opportunity.Location__c}+"'"

formulas.name: QueryInitialTableCurrentProducts
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Product_Name__c , Acces_Type__c, End_date__c, Entry_Date__c , Quantity , TotalPrice FROM QuoteLineItem where QuoteId = '" & {!recordId.Id} &"' "

formulas.name: QueryPackageBuilderActiveOpportunties
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Access_Type__c, End_date__c, Entry_Date__c, Opportunity__c, Quantity, TotalPrice FROM OpportunityLineItem where PricebookEntryId= '" & {!ChoiceProductEnrtyTable.firstSelectedRow.Id} &"' AND Opportunity.StageName NOT IN ('Closed Won', 'Closed Lost') AND OpportunityId != '" & {!Get_Opportunity.Id} &"'"

formulas.name: QueryPackageBuilderActiveOrders
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, UnitPrice, Quantity, Access_Type__c, Account_Contract__c, EndDate, ServiceDate, TotalPrice, Contract__r.Account.Name FROM OrderItem where PricebookEntryId= '" & {!ChoiceProductEnrtyTable.firstSelectedRow.Id} &"' AND Order.Contract.Status ='Activated' "

actions.name: Quote_Package_Builder_Add_Remove_Quote_Products
actions.label: Quote Package Builder - Add/Remove Quote Products

actions.name: Quote_Package_Builder_Remove_Quote_Products
actions.label: Quote Package Builder - Add/Remove Quote Products
